name: anbi2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wa(w2, w0), wa(w2, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wa(w2, w0), wa(w2, w1)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wa(w2, w0), wa(w2, w1)))

comment: Introduce a left conjunct to both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2013.)
